overloadedarmorbar.config.tt.colors: List of colors, in the form of #xxxxxx hex values, space separated
overloadedarmorbar.config.tt.showempty: Show unused armor slots in black, instead of not at all
overloadedarmorbar.config.tt.alwaysshow: Show the armor bar even if the player isn't wearing armor
overloadedarmorbar.config.tt.offset: Offsets armor bar if player has an effect such as absorption or health boost, disable if mods change the health bar from vanilla
